fields.value: The Press!
fields.name: press_name

fields.value: Footer
fields.name: footer
submission_guidelines

fields.value:
This is a description block where information about this press can be entered. This text block should be replace with text pulled from a database setting at some point, though for now I don't really need it to.

This press has some specialities like publishing Alien Autopsy reports and April Fools reviews

BOOYA!
fields.name: description

fields.value:
Dear {{ review.user.first_name }} {{ review.user.last_name }},

__YOUR_MESSAGE_HERE__

Please log into the press web site to indicate whether you will undertake the review or not, as well as to access the submission and to record your review and recommendation.

The review itself is due {{ review.due }}.

The Author has requested that this review be {{book.get_review_type_display}}.

Please notify us if you intend to undertake the review by clicking this link: {{ decision_url }}

Thank you for considering this request.

Sincerely,
Press Team
fields.name: review_request

fields.value: abp

fields.value:
Dear {{ review.user.first_name }} {{ review.user.last_name }},

__YOUR_MESSAGE_HERE__

Please log into the press web site to indicate whether you will undertake the review or not, as well as to access the submission and to record your review and recommendation.

The review itself is due {{ review.due }}.

Review URL: {{ review_url }}

Thank you for considering this request.


Sincerely,
Press Team

fields.value:
Dear {{submission.owner.first_name}} {{submission.owner.last_name}},

A contract has been uploaded by the Editor for you to review. Please login using the link below to review and sign off the contract.

{{base_url}}/user/submission/{{submission.id}}

Regards,

Editorial
fields.name: contract_author_sign_off

fields.value:
Dear {{review.user.profile.salutation}} {{review.user.last_name}},

This is a gentle reminder that we requested you review a book for us called {{book.title}}. This review is due to be completed by {{review.due:date"c"}}. If you are unable to undertake this review, please let us know.

Regards,
fields.name: unaccepted_reminder

fields.value:
Dear {{review.user.profile.salutation}} {{review.user.last_name}},

This is a gentle reminder that you agreed to review a book for us called {{book.title}}. This review is due to be completed by {{review.due|date:"c"}}. If you are unable to undertake this review, please let us know.

Regards,
fields.name: accepted_reminder

fields.value:
Dear {{review.user.profile.salutation}} {{review.user.last_name}},

This is a gentle reminder that you agreed to review a book for us called {{book.title}}. This review is overdue, we requested that the review be completed by {{review.due|date:"c"}}. If you are unable to undertake this review, please let us know.

Regards,
fields.name: overdue_reminder

fields.value:
Dear {{ revision.book.owner.first_name }} {{ revision.book.owner.last_name }},

We think you should undertake some revisions to this article before it moves forward.

You can submit revisions here: {{ revision_url }}

Regards,
fields.name: request_revisions
revisions_reminder_email

fields.value:
Dear {% if copyedit.copyeditor.profile.salutation %}{{copyedit.copyeditor.profile.salutation}}{% else %}{{copyedit.copyeditor.first_name}}{% endif %} {{copyedit.copyeditor.last_name}},

This is a request that you undertake copyediting on {{submission.title}}. Please login to the BMS, you will be directed to undertake your copyedit from the user dashboard.

Your username is: {{copyedit.copyeditor.username}}

Copyedits are requested to be completed by: {{copyedit.due}}.

Regards
fields.name: copyedit_request

fields.value: Hello Mr. Copyeditor. Please undertake this copyedit. You can download the files below and please upload the completed ones. If you have feedback for the Editor/Author fill in the notes box and this will be presented to both.
fields.name: copyedit_instructions

fields.value:
Dear {{ submission.owner.first_name }} {{ submission.owner.last_name }},

The copyeditor has completed their work. You can login and review the copyedits now.

Regards,
fields.name: author_copyedit_request

fields.value: The Editor has requested that you approve some copyediting.
fields.name: copyedit_author_instructions

fields.value:
Dear {% if index.indexer.profile.salutation %}{{index.indexer.profile.salutation}}{% else %}{{index.indexer.first_name}}{% endif %} {{index.indexer.last_name}},

This is a request that you undertake copyediting on {{submission.title}}. Please login to the BMS, you will be directed to undertake your copyedit from the user dashboard.

Your username is: {{index.indexer.username}}

Copyedits are requested to be completed by: {{iindex.due}}.

Regards
fields.name: index_request

fields.value: Please do some great indexing. Lots of love, Andy.
fields.name: index_instructions

fields.value:
Dear {% if typeset.typesetter.profile.salutation %}{{typeset.typesetter.profile.salutation}}{% else %}{{typeset.typesetter.first_name}}{% endif %} {{typeset.typesetter.last_name}},

This is a request that you undertake copyediting on {{submission.title}}.

Please login to the BMS, you will be directed to undertake your copyedit from the user dashboard. Your username is: {{typeset.typesetter.username}} Copyedits are requested to be completed by: {{typeset.due}}.

Regards,

{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature|safe }}{% endif %}
fields.name: typeset_request

fields.value: Here are some instructions
fields.name: typeset_instructions

Dear {{ submission.owner.first_name }} {{ submission.owner.last_name }},

The typesetter has completed their work. You can login and review the typeset files now.

Regards,

{% if sender %}{{ sender.profile.signature }}{% endif %}
fields.name: author_typeset_request

fields.value: DO SOMETHING! JUST. DO IT!
fields.name: typeset_author_instructions

fields.value:
Dear {{typeset.typesetter.profile.full_name}},

DO SOME TYPESETTING PLEASE!

Regards,
fields.name: typesetter_typeset_request

fields.value:
Dear {{ submission.owner.first_name }} {{ submission.owner.last_name }},

Your submission has been received. An Editor will be in touch soon with the next steps.

Regards,
